name: Mini racer (MugelStudios)
description: A race against time and a true test of skill. Racing game in Mariocart and Trackmania style. Singleplayer so far, but multiplayer update might follow. I will add more maps and gamemodes in the future. A christmas map is in planning. This is the first game I have uploaded so please have mercy in the comments. Constructive feedback is very welcome and I will do my best to answer back.
